name: SpaceDrifter 4500
description:
Oh no! Our ship, the SpaceDrifter 4500, has run out of fuel...and we'll soon run out of oxygen! We (a.k.a you) must somehow navigate our way home without any resources! Hopefully we can find some on the way..and hopefully we don't crash into any asteroids.

SpaceDrifter 4500 is a game made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45 (Theme: "Start With Nothing" ... Category: "Compo"). I'm responsible for the code, art and design of this game. I hope you enjoy! It's my first Ludum Dare and I had a ton of fun!

--

Controls:

M - Toggle Minimap

WASD+J - Thrust in specified direction (only works if you have fuel)

(8-directional thrusting, ideally by pressing (and holding) WASD direction first then pressing (and holding) J)
